story:
This event is raising funds for Rise Against Hunger Philippines (RAHP), a member of the global confederation of Rise Against Hunger which is an international hunger relief organization that coordinates the distribution of food and other life-saving aid around the world. RAHP operates the first foodbank in the country. It is a member of the Global Foodbanking Network and the Association of Asian Foodbanks.

Each meal for a person in need costs PHP 25. Let's fundraise to support hunger alleviation in the Philippines!

updates.content: Bless those people who have nothing to eat. Food is a source of joy, strength, and resilience. We all need to give back to our family and community. One way we can be truly happy is by helping one another.
